mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.account, a.`password`, a.`name`, a.group_id AS group_id FROM admin AS a WHERE a.account=#{account} AND a.`password`=#{password}

select count(*) from admin a LEFT JOIN `group` g on a.group_id=g.id where 1=1
and a.name like '%${name}%'
and a.account like '%${account}%'
and a.group_id = #{groupId}
select count(*) from admin where account=#{account}
SELECT b.id, b.module, b.parent_id as parentId, b.url FROM group_auth AS a LEFT JOIN authority AS b ON b.id=a.auth_id WHERE a.group_id=#{groupId} ORDER BY b.id ASC
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(auth_id) AS authCode FROM group_auth WHERE group_id =#{groupId}
mapper.update: UPDATE admin SET admin.`password` = #{password} WHERE id = #{id}
